title: JamRun IPTV EPG Guide - Complete Setup Tutorial
metaTitle: JamRun IPTV EPG Setup Guide 2025 | Tutorial
description: Learn how to set up and use EPG (Electronic Program Guide) in JamRun IPTV. Complete 2025 guide with step-by-step instructions.

content.intro: JamRun IPTV offers excellent EPG (Electronic Program Guide) support. This guide will show you how to configure and get the most out of EPG features in JamRun IPTV.
benefits: See what's on now and later
requirements: EPG URL or built-in EPG
Compatible IPTV player
Internet connection

steps.title: Open JamRun IPTV Settings
steps.description: Launch JamRun IPTV and navigate to the Settings or Preferences menu.

steps.title: Find EPG Options
steps.description: Look for the EPG section in the settings. This may be under Playback, Interface, or a dedicated section.

steps.title: Configure EPG
steps.description: Adjust the EPG settings according to your preferences. Enable the feature if it's disabled.

steps.title: Save and Test
steps.description: Save your settings and test the EPG functionality by playing a channel.

faqs.question: Does JamRun IPTV support EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, JamRun IPTV fully supports EPG (Electronic Program Guide). You can configure it in the settings.

faqs.question: How do I enable EPG in JamRun IPTV?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Interface and look for the EPG option.

content.conclusion: EPG (Electronic Program Guide) is a powerful feature in JamRun IPTV that enhances your viewing experience. Follow the steps above to get it configured properly.

title: Kodi VOD Guide - Complete Setup Tutorial
metaTitle: Kodi VOD Setup Guide 2025 | Tutorial
description: Learn how to set up and use VOD (Video on Demand) in Kodi. Complete 2025 guide with step-by-step instructions.

content.intro: Kodi offers excellent VOD (Video on Demand) support. This guide will show you how to configure and get the most out of VOD features in Kodi.
requirements: IPTV provider with VOD
Compatible player
Sufficient bandwidth

steps.title: Open Kodi Settings
steps.description: Launch Kodi and navigate to the Settings or Preferences menu.

steps.title: Find VOD Options
steps.description: Look for the VOD section in the settings. This may be under Playback, Interface, or a dedicated section.

steps.title: Configure VOD
steps.description: Adjust the VOD settings according to your preferences. Enable the feature if it's disabled.

steps.title: Save and Test
steps.description: Save your settings and test the VOD functionality by playing a channel.

faqs.question: Does Kodi support VOD?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kodi fully supports VOD (Video on Demand). You can configure it in the settings.

faqs.question: How do I enable VOD in Kodi?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Playback and look for the VOD option.

content.conclusion: VOD (Video on Demand) is a powerful feature in Kodi that enhances your viewing experience. Follow the steps above to get it configured properly.

steps.title: Open Televizo Settings
